answers.answer: Everything sound pretty normal but w swelling can nwver be to sure
No getting dizzy isnt normal call the doc !
My doctor said those are signs of preclampsia. Please call your Dr NOW!!!
You need to call if you have a bp cuff at your home take your bp you could have high bp which is a sign of preeclampsia.
Yeah none of that sounds normal. All those are signs of high blood pressure which could   mean preeclampsia. You definitely need to call the dr

Iv had all that both pregnancies and havent had high bp or preclampsia .. dizziness in pregnancy can b because of hormone changes spec at 13 wks i was like that around that time w both pregnacies and dr told me it was due to my hormones and increase blood my bp has never been high ... randomly waking up swollen though .. but checking bp is def a good idea because if it is high  theyre def gonna wanna check u out

question: Today I woke up to my hands and feet swelled up and I can't stand more the a few mins and I time, I get really dizzy, light headed, my vision get blurry, I see little black spots, and I could faint. Plus I get so over heated. I'm 13 weeks 5 days. Please help. I don't feel right.
title: Should I call the drs?
